p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int uid)? onActiveSpeaker;
public virtual void OnActiveSpeaker(RtcConnection connection, uint uid) { }

section.p:
After successfully calling , the SDK continuously monitors the remote user with the highest volume and counts how many times this user is identified as the loudest. The remote user with the highest count during a period is considered the most active speaker. When there are two or more users in the channel and there is an active remote speaker, the SDK triggers this callback and reports the uid of the most active remote user.
If the most active remote speaker remains the same, the SDK does not trigger the callback again.
If the most active remote speaker changes, the SDK triggers this callback again and reports the uid of the new most active remote user.
